mapper.sql: f.uuid uuid, f.yjbm yjbm, f.yjmc yjmc, f.ssdz ssdz, f.ssdzmc ssdzmc, f.xzqy xzqy, f.yjlx yjlx, f.sccj sccj, f.pc pc, f.cbl cbl, f.czl czl, f.cjrid cjrid, f.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(f.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, f.xgrid xgrid, f.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(f.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, f.delete_flag deleteFlag, f.datasource datasource, f.bz bz, f.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(f.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, f.reserve1 reserve1, f.reserve2 reserve2, f.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(f.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_WL_XFYJXX f WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_WL_XFYJXX f WHERE f.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFYJXX(uuid,yjbm,yjmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqy,yjlx,sccj,pc,cbl,czl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjlx,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{czl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_WL_XFYJXX f SET f.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND f.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFYJXX(uuid,yjbm,yjmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqy,yjlx,sccj,pc,cbl,czl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yjbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjbm,#{item.yjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjmc,#{item.ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdz,#{item.ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdzmc,#{item.xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqy,#{item.yjlx,jdbcType=DOUBLE} yjlx,#{item.sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sccj,#{item.pc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} pc,#{item.cbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cbl,#{item.czl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} czl,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yjbm = VALUES(yjbm), yjmc = VALUES(yjmc), ssdz = VALUES(ssdz), ssdzmc = VALUES(ssdzmc), xzqy = VALUES(xzqy), yjlx = VALUES(yjlx), sccj = VALUES(sccj), pc = VALUES(pc), cbl = VALUES(cbl), czl = VALUES(czl), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
